member.summary: Utility class to encapsulate row-based access to Azure table storage.
member.typeparam: Table data entry used by this table / manager.

member.summary: Name of the table this instance is managing.

member.summary: Logger for this table manager instance.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.#ctor(Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOperationOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Storage configuration.
Logger to use.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.InitTableAsync
member.summary: Connects to, or creates and initializes a new Azure table if it does not already exist.
member.returns: Completion promise for this operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.DeleteTableAsync
member.summary: Deletes the Azure table.
member.returns: Completion promise for this operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.ClearTableAsync
member.summary: Deletes all entities the Azure table.
member.returns: Completion promise for this operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.CreateTableEntryAsync(`0)
member.summary: Create a new data entry in the Azure table (insert new, not update existing). Fails if the data already exists.
member.param: Data to be inserted into the table.
member.returns: Value promise with new Etag for this data entry after completing this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.UpsertTableEntryAsync(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a data entry in the Azure table: creates a new one if does not exists or overwrites (without eTag) an already existing version (the "update in place" semantics).
member.param: Data to be inserted or replaced in the table.
member.returns: Value promise with new Etag for this data entry after completing this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.InsertTableEntryAsync(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a data entry in the Azure table: creates a new one if does not exists
member.param: Data to be inserted or replaced in the table.
member.returns: Value promise with new Etag for this data entry after completing this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.MergeTableEntryAsync(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Merges a data entry in the Azure table.
member.param: Data to be merged in the table.
ETag to apply.
member.returns: Value promise with new Etag for this data entry after completing this storage operation.

members.member:
Updates a data entry in the Azure table: updates an already existing data in the table, by using eTag. Fails if the data does not already exist or of eTag does not match.
Data to be updated into the table. /// ETag to use. Value promise with new Etag for this data entry after completing this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.DeleteTableEntryAsync(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes an already existing data in the table, by using eTag. Fails if the data does not already exist or if eTag does not match.
member.param: Data entry to be deleted from the table.
ETag to use.
member.returns: Completion promise for this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.ReadSingleTableEntryAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Read a single table entry from the storage table.
member.param: The partition key for the entry.
The row key for the entry.
member.returns: Value promise for tuple containing the data entry and its corresponding etag.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.ReadAllTableEntriesForPartitionAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Read all entries in one partition of the storage table. NOTE: This could be an expensive and slow operation for large table partitions!
member.param: The key for the partition to be searched.
member.returns: Enumeration of all entries in the specified table partition.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.ReadAllTableEntriesAsync
member.summary: Read all entries in the table. NOTE: This could be a very expensive and slow operation for large tables!
member.returns: Enumeration of all entries in the table.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.DeleteTableEntriesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{System.Tuple{`0,System.String}})
member.summary: Deletes a set of already existing data entries in the table, by using eTag. Fails if the data does not already exist or if eTag does not match.
member.param: Data entries and their corresponding etags to be deleted from the table.
member.returns: Completion promise for this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.ReadTableEntriesAndEtagsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Read data entries and their corresponding eTags from the Azure table.
member.param: Filter string to use for querying the table and filtering the results.
member.returns: Enumeration of entries in the table which match the query condition.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.BulkInsertTableEntries(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{`0})
member.summary: Inserts a set of new data entries into the table. Fails if the data does already exists.
member.param: Data entries to be inserted into the table.
member.returns: Completion promise for this storage operation.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableDataManager`1.GetAccountKeyUsingAad
member.summary: Cosmos DB does not support AAD auth directly. This method uses the Azure ARM API to fetch the key. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cosmos-db/managed-identity-based-authentication

member.name: T:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableConstants
member.summary: Constants related to Azure Table storage (also applies to Table endpoints in Cosmos DB).

member.name: T:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils
member.summary: General utility functions related to Azure Table storage (also applies to Table endpoints in Cosmos DB).

member.name: F:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.ANY_ETAG
member.summary: ETag of value "*" to match any etag for conditional table operations (update, merge, delete).

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.TableStorageDataNotFound(System.Exception)
member.summary: Inspect an exception returned from Azure storage libraries to check whether it means that attempt was made to read some data that does not exist in storage table.
member.param: Exception that was returned by Azure storage library operation
member.returns: True if this exception means the data being read was not present in Azure table storage

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.ExtractRestErrorCode(System.Exception)
member.summary: Extract REST error code from DataServiceClientException or DataServiceQueryException
member.param: Exception to be inspected.
member.returns: Returns REST error code if found, otherwise null

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.EvaluateException(System.Exception,System.Net.HttpStatusCode@,System.String@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Examine a storage exception, and if applicable extracts the HTTP status code, and REST error code if getRESTErrors=true.
member.param: Exception to be examined.
Output HTTP status code if applicable, otherwise HttpStatusCode.Unused (306)
When getRESTErrors=true, will output REST error code if applicable, otherwise null
Whether REST error code should also be examined / extracted.
member.returns: Returns true if HTTP status code and REST error were extracted.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.IsRetriableHttpError(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified HTTP status / error code is returned in a transient / retriable error condition
member.param: HTTP error code value
REST error code value
member.returns: true if this is a transient / retriable error condition

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.IsContentionError(System.Net.HttpStatusCode)
member.summary: Check whether a HTTP status code returned from a REST call might be due to a (temporary) storage contention error.
member.param: HTTP status code to be examined.
member.returns: Returns true if the HTTP status code is due to storage contention.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.IsNotFoundError(System.Net.HttpStatusCode)
member.summary: Check whether a HTTP status code returned from a REST call might be due to a (temporary) storage contention error.
member.param: HTTP status code to be examined.
member.returns: Returns true if the HTTP status code is due to storage contention.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AzureStorage.AzureTableUtils.SanitizeTableProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Remove any characters that can't be used in Azure PartitionKey or RowKey values.
